children.description: Child nodes of the tree view (React component or element)

className.description: Class to add to add if not passed a parentItem

hasCheckboxes.description: Flag indicating if the tree view has checkboxes.

hasGuides.description: Flag indicating if tree view has guide lines.

hasSelectableNodes.description: Flag indicating that tree nodes should be independently selectable, even when having children

variant.description: Variant presentation styles for the tree view.
